abstract: Phoenix, NY, authorities remain mystified over sudden death of John C Birdlebough High School football player Ridge Barden during varsity game; film shows that Barden did not have contact with another player on play before he collapsed on field.
snippet: Ridge Barden of John C. Birdlebough High School died after losing consciousness during a game.
lead_paragraph: Ridge Barden of John C. Birdlebough High School died after losing consciousness during a game.

headline.main: Routine Goal-Line Play Leads to a Sudden Death and Unsettling Questions
headline.print_headline: Sudden Death of Player Raises Difficult Questions
headline.seo: Death of Phoenix Player Raises Questions
